title: The Veronicas New Reality Show Drops In November, So Hook Me Up With A Foxtel Subscription
text:
Get ready for a reality TV binge because The Veronicas are getting their own show, and it comes out next month.

Yes, your gals Jess and Lisa Origliasso, Australia’s favourite sisters are getting their own reality show.

The show was announced back in May of this year, but with their recent Qantas debacle, Australia is more interested in their lives than ever before.

Produced by reality kings, MTV Australia, the show is basically the Keeping Up With The Kardashians of Oz. It will document their daily life and the ups and downs of being Australian music royalty.

“We grew up with MTV and to be able to create a show together, bringing people closer inside our lives of music and as sisters, is going to be a wild ride,” Jess and Lisa said in a statement.

Basically, we can expect an inside look at their Brisbane-based lives, which honestly don’t seem that dramatic. But hopefully we’ll get to see their side of the whole Qantas flight saga that took place yesterday.

“The Veronicas were part of our first-ever MTV Push launch in 2009, and we are so excited to work with them again and give fans a new, behind-the-scenes look into their lives and music in a way only MTV can do,” Viacom global head of music and talent Bruce Gillmer said.

The show will be shot and produced in Australia, and will depict their day to day lives in the lead up to the release of their next album, due out in early 2020 (mark your calendars).

Since their debut album The Secret Life Of… went quadruple platinum back in 2005, The Veronicas have remained an iconic part of Australian pop music.

More recently, their 2007 track Untouched went viral on Twitter for reasons I don’t quite understand, and thus, The Veronicas resurgence began.

They’re about to play Good Things festival, and are apparently working on a fourth studio album that’s set to be filled with more certified bangers.

“The Wall of death at Good Things has nothing on a day in the life of Jess and Lisa, let’s just put it that way,” Lisa told Music Feeds when discussing the upcoming show.

Jess & Lisa: The Veronicas is set to premiere on Foxtel in November 2019.
description: Australian pop icons The Veronicas are set to release their own reality TV show in partnership with MTV debuting in November 2019.
